titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide direct and guaranteed loans, loan guarantees, and grants to complete the construction and rehabilitation of rural critical access hospitals.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 2/15/2007--Introduced. Amends the the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide direct and guaranteed loans, loan guarantees, and grants to complete the construction and rehabilitation of rural critical access hospitals.
